item.title: Let’s take a journey
item.description:
Let’s take a journey

a little of a paragraph describing certain things

item.title: The Future of the Telephone Call
item.description:
The Future of the Telephone Call

What can the future be holding on the other line? Throughout the day our phones are constantly ringing, ringing with text messages, FaceTime, voice notes, Facebook messengers, and snapchats, ringing with anything but an incoming call.

item.title: Case Study: Rav Kav Public Transportation App
item.description:
Case Study: Rav Kav Public Transportation App

Public transportation systems around the world have been issuing fancy new plastic cards that get rid of the old paper tickets and store all your fares, and Israel is no different. 'Rav Kav' is the system used in Israel. Can we make it better?

item.title: Case Study: Remind me to make a reminder
item.description:
Case Study: Remind me to make a reminder

When we want to plan something or remember something today we most likely will enter it into a to-do, reminder or calendar app on our phone. In a lot of cases this does help us as we can set at time and a location and have a notification pop up and remind us. But this leaves out a huge type of reminder, a reminder that isn’t set by a time.

item.title: Case Study: Daily Dose
item.description:
Case Study: Daily Dose

For a couple years now I wanted to design a motivational/quote type of app based on Pirkei Avot - Ethics of our Fathers, a phenomenal read with countless gems. I envisioned getting a notification once a day with a little excerpt from the Chapters and probably a question or something at the end to get you to think about the quote or something to focus on during your day.
